add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingName: Add an Image to PDF (with Alt Text) - Rollout
add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingDescription: One of the important features users need when managing their PDF files is adding an image. Users want an easy way to add an image to their PDF documents that they can easily resize and move around the document. This experiment measures the impact of launching this feature for Firefox users and if that impacts their usage in any way. Specifically, we are trying to understand the impact on Firefox Daily Active Users (DAU) as a result of launching this feature.

csv-import-release-rollout.userFacingDescription: This rollout enables users to import logins from a CSV file from the about:logins page.

ech-roll-out.userFacingDescription: Encrypted Client Hello is a new TLS feature which provides greater privacy for HTTPS connections.

upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

phc-rollout.userFacingDescription: Roll out the Probabilistic Heap Checker in Firefox Release.

highlighting-in-pdfs-rollout.userFacingDescription: Feature to highlight text and other content in PDFs

long-term-holdback-2024-h1-velocity-desk.userFacingName: Long term holdback 2024 H1 Velocity Desktop
long-term-holdback-2024-h1-velocity-desk.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for H1 Velocity experiments

consolidated-search-configuration-row-de.userFacingDescription: Consolidated search configuration for desktop and mobile Firefox

subtitle.raw: Make browsing faster, safer, or just plain fun with Firefox add-ons. See what our staff recommends!

recommend-add-ons-staff-pick-relaunch-tr.userFacingName: Recommend Add-ons - Staff pick Relaunch - Treatment A Rollout
recommend-add-ons-staff-pick-relaunch-tr.userFacingDescription: Recommending staff pick add-ons after first run.

subtitle.raw: Start your search here to quickly get results, including sites you’ve bookmarked and visited before.

discovery-of-search-sap-early-day-en.userFacingName: Discovery of Search SAP Early Day EN
discovery-of-search-sap-early-day-en.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message that informs the user that they can use the URL bar to search the internet without having to first navigate to a search site.

We’ll show you every tab you have open, across all your windows.

fx-view-discoverability-early-day-users.userFacingName: Fx View Discoverability - Early Day users
fx-view-discoverability-early-day-users.userFacingDescription: Message Experiment:  Discovery of Firefox View

de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Sie wollten diesen Tab nicht schließen?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Durchsuchen Sie alle Ihre offenen und geschlossenen Tabs, um ihn schnell zu finden.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Hier können Sie sie schnell finden und wieder öffnen. Wir speichern eine Chronik Ihrer kürzlich geschlossenen Tabs für Sie.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Wir zeigen Ihnen alle geöffneten Tabs in allen Fenstern.

fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Vous ne vouliez pas fermer cet onglet ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Recherchez dans tous vos onglets ouverts et fermés pour le trouver rapidement.
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Retrouvez-le et rouvrez-le rapidement ici. Nous conservons un historique des onglets que vous avez récemment fermés.
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Nous vous affichons tous vos onglets ouverts, dans toutes vos fenêtres.

it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Cerca in tutte le tue schede, sia aperte che chiuse, per trovarla velocemente.
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Qui puoi trovarla e riaprirla velocemente. Conserviamo per te una cronologia delle schede chiuse di recente.
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Ti mostreremo tutte le schede aperte, in tutte le finestre.
it.fx-view-discoverability-split-button-opt: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
